column4: Hi, does someone know an educating tool, for trying out relational algebra queries? We use one on our school called WinRDBI but, this can not run on Ubuntu, so it would be nice if someone here, maybe knows about another free alternative?
you could either try just installing one of the many SQL databases, or you could try running your Windows software in wine
ok, well I guess I need to install a dbms then, cause I can't get it running in wine, thanks
you might want to look at phpmyadmin too, then
